salads.name: Caesar Salad
salads.description: Crisp romaine, house-made Caesar dressing, Parmesan, and garlic croutons.

salads.name: Beetroot & Goat Cheese Salad
salads.description: Roasted beets with creamy goat cheese, arugula, and a balsamic reduction.

salads.name: Quinoa & Avocado Salad
salads.description: Protein-packed quinoa with avocado, kale, and citrus vinaigrette.

salads.name: Burrata & Arugula Salad
salads.description: Peppery arugula with creamy burrata, heirloom tomatoes, and a drizzle of olive oil.

salads.name: Caprese Salad
salads.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil with a balsamic reduction.
